product_name: REI MultiTowel X Large Towel - 54" x 25"
long_description: Textured for increased comfort and absorption, the X Large-size REI MultiTowel is soft and quick drying. The X Large size is ideal for travel to warm locales or hikes to hidden lakes. Waffle texture allows the towel to absorb up to 8 times its weight in water, yet wring out almost completely dry. Ultrasoft synthetic fabric is light and compact, taking up very little space in your backpack or bag. Quick-attach loop makes it easy to hang the towel to dry. The REI MultiTowel comes in a carry pouch.
short_description: Textured for increased comfort and absorption, the X Large-size REI MultiTowel is soft and quick drying. The X Large size is ideal for travel to warm locales or hikes to hidden lakes.
